name: testMoveVisibleColumns
description: Verify that changing the order of visible columns in Settings affects the table.
descriptionHtml: Verify that changing the order of visible columns in Settings affects the table.
statusMessage:

steps.name: Check visible column 'Creation Date (GMT)' in Settings
Verify: Selected column headers are displayed in the correct order in the transactions table.
